extendedInfo.description: Gone Fishing is an application created to help fishermen share details about fish they have caught. The application allows you to view catches logged from all around the world. Fields supported: - Name & Description/Notes- Date and Time- Species- Air Temperature (set Celsius or Fahrenheit in preferences)- Water Temperature- Water Clarity (Muddy, Clear, etc.)- Attach a pictureFeel free to email me with any suggestions! Permissions Used: 	Internet - To download Google Map data	Access Fine Location - Access to GPS location	Read-only access to phone state

reviews.title: Simple yet effective
reviews.comment: A great tool. Doesn\'t require registration. Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
